name: Distribute.ai
description: Distribute.ai is a decentralized AI compute network that transforms idle hardware into a globally distributed supercomputer. By enabling users to contribute their computing resources through desktop applications or browser extensions, the platform facilitates the execution of AI workloads across a vast network. This approach reduces reliance on centralized cloud providers, lowers costs, and democratizes access to AI infrastructure. Distribute.ai supports a variety of AI applications, including image generation, speech-to-text, and chatbots, and rewards contributors with its native token, $DIS, for verifiable participation. The platform aims to build a scalable, resilient, and user-owned foundation for the future of AI.
